landingPage.heroTitle: Experience the Future of Conversational AI
landingPage.heroSubtitle: Engage with multiple AI models in your preferred language, with personalized context and secure chat history.

features.featuresSubtitle: Discover what makes our AI chatbot stand out from the rest
features.featureMultilingualDescription: Chat in English, Arabic, and more languages with seamless switching between them.
features.featureMultiModelDescription: Access various AI models from OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google in one interface.
features.featureChatHistoryDescription: Save and revisit your conversations anytime, organized and searchable.
features.featurePersonalizationDescription: AI learns from your interactions to provide more relevant responses over time.
features.featureSecurityDescription: Your conversations are private and secure with end-to-end encryption.
features.featureAIDescription: Experience state-of-the-art AI capabilities with continuous improvements.

supportedModels.supportedModelsSubtitle: Choose from a variety of leading AI models to suit your needs
supportedModels.gpt4Description: OpenAI's most advanced model with superior reasoning capabilities
supportedModels.gpt35Description: Fast and efficient model for everyday tasks and conversations
supportedModels.claudeOpusDescription: Anthropic's flagship model with exceptional comprehension and reasoning
supportedModels.claudeSonnetDescription: Balanced performance and efficiency for most use cases
supportedModels.geminiDescription: Google's multimodal AI with strong reasoning and knowledge
supportedModels.modelFeature2: Excellent at understanding context and nuance
supportedModels.modelFeature4: Fast response times for fluid conversations
supportedModels.modelFeature6: Good balance of capabilities and performance

faq.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our AI chatbot
faq.faqAnswer1: Your conversations are encrypted and stored securely. We do not share your data with third parties, and you can delete your chat history at any time.
faq.faqAnswer2: Currently, we fully support English and Arabic with complete interface translations. The AI models can understand and respond in many more languages.
faq.faqQuestion3: Can I use this for professional purposes?
faq.faqAnswer3: Our chatbot is designed for both personal and professional use. Many professionals use it for research, content creation, programming assistance, and more.
faq.faqQuestion4: How does the AI personalization work?
faq.faqAnswer4: Our system analyzes your interactions to build a user summary that helps the AI provide more relevant responses. This is all done securely and privately.
faq.faqQuestion5: Is there a limit to how much I can chat?
faq.faqAnswer5: Usage limits depend on your subscription plan. Free users have a generous monthly allowance, while premium users enjoy higher or unlimited usage.

cta.ctaTitle: Ready to Experience the Future of AI?
cta.ctaSubtitle: Start chatting with our advanced AI models and discover how they can assist you in your daily tasks.

chatPreview.previewMessage1: How can AI help with language translation?
chatPreview.previewResponse1: AI can provide real-time translations between multiple languages with high accuracy. It can preserve context, tone, and cultural nuances better than traditional translation tools.
chatPreview.previewMessage2: That's impressive! Can it handle technical content?
chatPreview.previewResponse2: Modern AI models are trained on diverse technical content and can accurately translate specialized terminology in fields like medicine, law, engineering, and more.
